H0.text: Nicknamed the cannibal, who is the only rider to have won all three jerseys in the same year in the Tour de France. Jacques Anquetil

H1.text: Nicknamed the cannibal, who is the only rider to have won all three jerseys in the same year in the Tour de France. Bernard Hinault

H2.text: Nicknamed the cannibal, who is the only rider to have won all three jerseys in the same year in the Tour de France. Miguel Indurain

H3.text: Nicknamed the cannibal, who is the only rider to have won all three jerseys in the same year in the Tour de France. Eddy Merx

A4.text: He acquired the nickname 'the Cannibal', suggested by the daughter of a teammate upon being told by her father of how Merckx would not let anyone else win.

A5.text: The only general, points and mountains classification winner in the Tour de France: 1969.
